participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is a practical and straightforward person who enjoys routine and stability.
participant_1.background: i've a german shepherd named barnaby. i am employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar.

participant_2.name: Emma

participant_2.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i enjoy coloring books.
